From labour chawk to digital rozgār

Problem We’re Solving

Seasonal peaks (transplanting/harvest/packhouse) create urgent demand; discovery is informal & last‑minute.
City‑bound migration by default — even when village‑near work exists.
“Labour chawk” dependency → no verified skills, no reliability, zero paper trail.
Slow/no payments; no digital payslips or history.
Generic job boards aren’t crew/per‑acre aware.
Benefits by stakeholder

Pilot Benefits

Workers / Crew Leads
  • Nearby work with distance shown
  • Escrowed UPI payouts + payslips
  • Skill badges → better pay
  • WhatsApp/IVR onboarding
Employers
  • Post by acre/ton/shift & crew size
  • Ranked matches by reliability & proximity
  • One‑click bulk UPI & invoices
  • Live fill‑rate & attendance
Ecosystem/Investors
  • Formalization & safety
  • Weekly wage & demand indices
  • Replicable cluster playbook
Two dense clusters for proof of speed & reliability

Initial Focus

Cluster A — Nashik (Horticulture)
Grapes & vegetables: pruning, harvest, grading, packhouse
50 Crew Leads500–1,000 Workers20 Anchor Employers
Cluster B — Ludhiana (Paddy/Wheat)
Transplanting, harvest loading, rice mill ops
50 Crew Leads500–1,000 Workers20 Anchor Employers
What ships in the pilot

Core Features

Distance‑aware discovery
Filter by km; stay/meals badges; commute‑friendly shifts.
Crew‑native posts
Acre/ton/shift units, required crew size, tools & badges.
Escrow → UPI payouts
Milestone releases, same‑day payouts, automatic payslips.
WhatsApp + IVR
Alerts, apply, attendance in your language.
Formalization
KYC, contracts, safety brief, dispute & replacement flows.
SLAs you can track
48‑hr fill rate, attendance, on‑time pay, repeat hires.
Blue‑collar & white‑collar across agri & allied

Fast, familiar, formal

How It Works

Workers / Crew Leads
  1. Join via WhatsApp or missed call → choose language.
  2. Share village/pincode, skills, availability; (optional) e‑KYC & UPI.
  3. Get nearby alerts; apply in one tap; crew leads add members.
  4. Complete milestones; mark attendance; receive UPI payouts; download payslip.
Employers
  1. Post in acre/ton/shift with crew size, skills & tools.
  2. Get ranked matches by reliability, proximity & availability.
  3. Start contract; approve milestones; bulk‑pay via UPI; invoices auto‑generated.
  4. Rate crews; re‑hire faster next time.
What we’ll report publicly every week

Quick answers

FAQs

Is this a gig app?
No. Short contracts (per‑acre/ton/shift) with payouts & payslips.
Any fees in pilot?
No fees for workers or employers in the pilot.
What if no‑show?
Replacement SLA under 24h; reliability affects ranking.
Distance & privacy?
Share GPS or just pincode; used only to compute distance.

From labour chawk to digital rozgār

Zero fees in pilot. We’re optimizing for speed to fill, reliability and on‑time payouts.
